title: Univers Revolved
content: [Univers Revolved](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924022020/http:/www.universrevolved.com/). An oldie but a goodie. I didn’t know it was available for [_free_ download](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924022020/http:/www.universrevolved.com/7.Download%20the%20Font/DownloadFrameset.htm).
author: Christopher Dean

comments.content: EKIT? The second symbol couldn’t be X, could it, with the raised bit in the middle?
Don, the letterforms are rotated on their edge rather than center point.
